name: Wolverine
description: When attacking alone Wolverine cannot be blocked.

name: Storm
description: When fielded, reroll up to 2 opposing characters.

name: Beast
description: When blocking, draw a dice and place in prep area

name: Gambit
description: When fielded, draw and roll one die.

name: Deadman
description: Choose a character. They may not attack or block while Deadman is Active

name: Constantine
description: Choose a character before opponent draws, if it's correct draw then the text is ignored for the turn.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man gains +1A for each active opposing villain.

name: Green Lantern
description: When attacking, other attackers gain +2A & +2D until the end of the turn.

name: Catwoman
description: Name a hero, draw random dice and if it matches, field this turn

name: Scarlet Witch
description: When Scarlet Witch is Active, you may reroll any dice one more time during the roll & reroll phase.
